verses.verse: These are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3117>it<s%>, all the days that you <S%H2416>live<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

You shall <S%H6>utterly<s%> <S%H6>destroy<s%> all the <S%H4725>places<s%>, where the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, upon the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and upon the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>:

And you shall <S%H5422>overthrow<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; and you shall hew <S%H1438>down<s%> the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them out of that <S%H4725>place<s%>.
You shall not do <S%H6213>so<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

But unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> out of all your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7933>there<s%>, even unto his habitation shall you <S%H1875>seek<s%>, and there you shall <S%H935>come<s%>:

And there you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, and heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and your freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flocks<s%>:

And there you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1004>unto<s%>, you and your households, where the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has blessed <S%H1288>you<s%>.
You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> after all the things that we <S%H6213>do<s%> here this <S%H3117>day<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> whatever is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
For you are not as yet <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4496>rest<s%> and to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>.

But when you go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives you to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>, and when he gives you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, so that you <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>;

Then there shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H935>there<s%>; there shall you bring all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H5930>you<s%>; your burnt offerings, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, and the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> which you <S%H5087>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your sons, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and your <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and your <S%H519>maidservants<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H3588>forasmuch<s%> as he has no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor inheritance with <S%H5159>you<s%>.
Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5927>offer<s%> not your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in every <S%H4725>place<s%> that you <S%H7200>see<s%>:

But in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, there you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and there you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I command <S%H6680>you<s%>.

Nevertheless you may <S%H2076>kill<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusts <S%H185>after<s%>, according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which he has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2931>you<s%>: the unclean and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6643>there<s%>, as of the roebuck, and as of the <S%H354>hart<s%>.
Only you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>; you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>corn<s%>, or of your <S%H8492>wine<s%>, or of your <S%H3323>oil<s%>, or the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> or of your <S%H6629>flock<s%>, nor any of your <S%H5088>vows<s%> which you <S%H5087>vow<s%>, nor your freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, or heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>:

But you must <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and your <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and your <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>: and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in all that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your hands <S%H3027>unto<s%>.
Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5800>forsake<s%> not the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as long as you <S%H3117>livest<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>border<s%>, as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, and you shall say, I will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, because your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>longs<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusts <S%H185>after<s%>.

If the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there be too <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H2076>you<s%>, then you shall kill of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6680>you<s%>, as I have commanded <S%H398>you<s%>, and you shall eat in your <S%H8179>gates<s%> whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusts <S%H185>after<s%>.

Even as the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%> and the <S%H354>hart<s%> is <S%H398>eaten<s%>, so you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>them<s%>: the unclean and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of them <S%H3162>alike<s%>.

Only be <S%H2388>sure<s%> that you <S%H398>eat<s%> not the <S%H1818>blood<s%>: for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life<s%>; and you may not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> with the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8210>it<s%>; you shall pour it upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3190>it<s%>; that it may go well with <S%H1121>you<s%>, and with your sons <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, when you shall do that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Only your holy <S%H6944>things<s%> which you <S%H5088>have<s%>, and your vows, you shall <S%H5375>take<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>:

And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3190>you<s%>, that it may go well with <S%H1121>you<s%>, and with your sons <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, when you <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>, where you go to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3423>them<s%>, and you succeedest <S%H3427>them<s%>, and dwell in their <S%H776>land<s%>;

Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to yourself that you be not <S%H5367>ensnared<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H310>them<s%>, after that they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1875>you<s%>; and that you inquire not after their <S%H430>gods<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, How did these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>? even so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%>.

You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> so unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: for every <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H8130>hates<s%>, have they <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>; for even their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> they have <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
What <S%H1697>thing<s%> soever I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H8104>you<s%>, observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3254>it<s%>: you shall not add to <S%H1639>it<s%>, nor take from it.
